Main Application (app.py)¶

This section contains the functions needed to render the web pages.

Parameters are obtained via the POST method (interaction with UI), other functions (interaction with database) or excel files.

app.check_constraints()[source]¶

Validates timetable against specified constraints.

Parameters

is_constraint_met()

Returns

dictionary containing date and list of unmet constraints.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: [“total call”, “clinic 1”, “clinic 2”]}

app.download_calls()[source]¶

Exports summary as PDF.

Parameters

summary data from retrieve_call_summary()

Returns

summary.pdf

app.download_icu_duties()[source]¶

Exports ICU duties roster as PDF.

Parameters

data from retrieve_icu_1_table() and retrieve_icu_2_table()

Returns

icu_1.pdf and icu_2.pdf

app.download_points()[source]¶

Exports points as PDF.

Parameters

points data from retrieve_points_summary()

Returns

points_senior.pdf and points_junior.pdf

app.download_schedules_csv()[source]¶

Exports timetable as CSV.

Parameters

data from exportScheduleS() and exportScheduleJ()

Returns

scheduleS.xlsx and scheduleJ.xlsx

app.download_timetable()[source]¶

Exports timetable as PDF.

Parameters

timetable data from TempJ and TempS tables

Returns

timetable_senior.pdf and timetable_junior.pdf

app.edit_constraints()[source]¶

Retrieves the changes made in the constraints in the Home page and updates the Constraints tables.

app.home()[source]¶

Redirects to Home page (home.html).

Parameters

retrieve_constraints()

Returns

dictionary of constraints name & constraints value.

For example: {“P”: 3, “amSat_clinic_1”: 1, “amSat_clinic_3”: 1}

app.icu_duties()[source]¶

Redirects to ICU Duties page (icu_duties.html).

Parameters

retrieve_icu_1_table() and retrieve_icu_2_table()

Returns

dictionary containing date and doctor.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: “Dr Lee”, “02-05-2021 Sunday”: “Dr Ho”}

app.past_timetable()[source]¶

Redirects to Past Timetable page (past_timetable.html).

Parameters

scheduleJ.xlsx and scheduleS.xlsx

Returns

nested dictionary containing status, doctor, date, type and remarks extracted from the excel files.

For example: {“S”: {“Dr Lee”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Off”: “”}}}, “J”: {“Dr Ho”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Duty”: “ICU 1”}}}}

app.points()[source]¶

Redirects to Points page (points.html).

Parameters

retrieve_points_summary()

Returns

nested dictionary containing status, doctor, points name and points value.

For example: {“S”:{“Dr Lee”:{“Clinic 1”:0, “Clinic 2”:0, “Clinic 3”:0}}, “J”:{“Dr Ho”:{“Clinic 1”:0, “Clinic 2”:0, “Clinic 3”:0}}}

app.populate_database()[source]¶

Generates new schedule.

It calls other functions to extract FormSG emails, extract information_excel.xlsx, populate database with these data and run LP.

app.print_excel_worksheet_to_pdf(i_sz_excel_path, i_sz_ws_name, i_sz_pdf_path)[source]¶

Aids the other download PDF functions by converting CSV to landscape PDF.

app.retrieve_call_summary()[source]¶

Calculates the number of doctors on call, leave and duty.

Parameters

timetable data from TempS and TempJ tables

Returns

nested dictionary containing date, summary name and summary value.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“P”: 0,”amSat Clinic 1”: 0,”amSat Clinic 3”: 0}}

app.retrieve_constraints()[source]¶

Retrieves specified constraints from Constraints table.

Parameters

timetable data from Constraints table

Returns

dictionary of constraints name & constraints value.

For example: {“P”: 3, “amSat_clinic_1”: 1, “amSat_clinic_3”: 1}

app.retrieve_icu_1_table()[source]¶

Retrieves the list of doctors assigned to ICU1 in the month.

Parameters

timetable data from TempS and TempJ tables

Returns

dictionary containing date and doctor.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: “Dr Lee”, “02-05-2021 Sunday”: “Dr Ho”}

app.retrieve_icu_2_table()[source]¶

Retrieves the list of doctors assigned to ICU2 in the month.

Parameters

timetable data from TempS and TempJ tables

Returns

dictionary containing date and doctor.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: “Dr Lee”, “02-05-2021 Sunday”: “Dr Ho”}

app.retrieve_points_summary()[source]¶

Retrieves the list of doctors and points obtained from being on call and duty.

Parameters

timetable data from TempS and TempJ tables

Returns

nested dictionary containing status, doctor, points name and points value.

For example: {“S”:{“Dr Lee”:{“Clinic 1”:0, “Clinic 2”:0, “Clinic 3”:0}}, “J”:{“Dr Ho”:{“Clinic 1”:0, “Clinic 2”:0, “Clinic 3”:0}}}

app.retrieve_timetable()[source]¶

Retrieves timeatable from TempJ and TempS tables.

Parameters

timetable data from TempJ and TempS tables

Returns

nested dictionary containing status, doctor, date, type and remarks generated by the LP.

For example: {“S”: {“Dr Lee”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Off”: “”}}}, “J”: {“Dr Ho”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Duty”: “ICU 1”}}}}

app.summary()[source]¶

Redirects to Summary page (summary.html).

Parameters

retrieve_call_summary()

Returns

nested dictionary containing date, summary name and summary value.

For example: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“P”: 0,”amSat Clinic 1”: 0,”amSat Clinic 3”: 0}}

app.timetable()[source]¶

Redirects to Timetable page (timetable.html).

Parameters

retrieve_timetable()

Returns

nested dictionary containing status, doctor, date, type and remarks generated by the LP.

For example: {“S”: {“Dr Lee”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Off”: “”}}}, “J”: {“Dr Ho”: {“01-05-2021 Saturday”: {“Duty”: “ICU 1”}}}}

app.update_icu_table()[source]¶

Retrieves the changes made in ICU Duties page and updates the ICU1Duty and ICU2Duty tables.

app.update_timetable_new()[source]¶

Retrieves the changes made in the timetable in Timetable page and updates the TempJ and TempS tables.
